title: Oh! Carol
lyrics: Intro  Oh! Carol I am but a fool Darlin' I love you tho' you treat me cruel You hurt me and you make me cry But if you leave me I will surely die Darling there will never be another 'Cause I love you so Don't ever leave me say you'll never go I will always want you for my sweet heart No matter what you do Oh Carol I'm so in love with you
